mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_NOTICE(NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME) VALUES(SEQ_NNO.NEXTVAL, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{originName}, #{changeName})
